sports.name: Handball
sports.description: is a team sport in which two teams of seven players each pass a ball using their hands with the aim of throwing it into the goal of the opposing team.

sports.name: Basketball
sports.description: A team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball through the defender's hoop.

sports.name: Football
sports.description: Football, is a team sport played between two teams of 11 players each, who primarily use their feet to propel a ball around a rectangular field called a pitch.

sports.name: Fitness
sports.description: Fitness is the practice of progressive resistance exercise to build, control, and develop one's muscles via hypertrophy.

sports.name: Running
sports.description: Running is a method of terrestrial locomotion by which humans and other animals move rapidly on foot.
